thread.title: Charming, quiet hotel in easy walk to some of the best restaurants and atttractions in the city.
thread.title_full: Charming, quiet hotel in easy walk to some of the best restaurants and atttractions in the city. - Review of Hotel de Londres Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Michele S
title: Charming, quiet hotel in easy walk to some of the best restaurants and atttractions in the city.
text:
This hotel was chosen for us by Rick Steves tours and it was excellent. We were in room 321, right next to the elevator and stairs. The only time we ever heard noise outside of our room was people taking the stairs when breakfast began. No big deal. We had a window facing the back courtyard and it was amazingly quiet. I heard birds, but nothing else.
Decor and room were lovely, if a bit small. It's Europe, after all! Walk a few blocks east to Rue Malar and eat at L'Ami Jean for one of the best meals of your life!
Room Tip: Courtyard-facing rooms are super quiet. See more room tips
